name: Into the Pyramid
description:
Play with 2-10 player online or play offline against the bots.

Missions
-Team: Collect the relics and escape from the pyramid.
-Assassin: Kill your friends and escape from the pyramid.
-Tutankhamun: Convert everybody in a mummy.
-Thief: Steal relics to the team or the big gem of the statue.


Features
-Highly customizable: Select the player missions you want to randomly assign to the players.
-Play with your friends or use the matchmaking list.
-In-game voice and text chat that only works in your vision range.
-Radial bar for fast communications with your teammates.
